column4: how can I figure out where the Mozilla / firefox plugins directory?
have you closed all instances of firefox and started it again?
is this a fresh dapper install or an upgrade?
It wasn't installed before the upgrade
did you use firefox1.5 on breezy?
no I installed firefox1.5 on dapper
that means you are running a custom installation of firefox instead of the one installed through apt
I did the upgrade to firefox1.5 as per (!firefox1.5)
ah ok, that would do it, just go to the !firefox1.5 page and follow the removal instructions
and after that I'll be back to firefox 1.0.7?
no, dapper has firefox1.5 available in apt
